scripts.dev: concurrently --kill-others "yarn --prefix client run start" "yarn --prefix serverless run dev"
scripts.test: yarn --prefix lib run test && yarn --prefix client run test -- --watch-all=false && yarn --prefix serverless run test
scripts.postinstall: (cd client && yarn install); (cd lib && yarn install); (cd serverless && yarn install)
scripts.lib: (yarn --prefix lib run build); (cd client && yarn upgrade abt-lib); (cd serverless && yarn upgrade abt-lib)
